name: vscode-javascript-booster
description: Boost your productivity with advanced JavaScript refactorings and commands
author: Stepan Burguchev <me@sburg.net>

scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.compile: cd client && npm run compile && cd ../server && npm run compile && cd ..
scripts.compile:client: cd client && npm run compile && cd ..
scripts.compile:server: cd server && npm run compile && cd ..
scripts.test: cd server && npm test -- --coverage && cd ../client && npm test && cd ..
scripts.version: cd client && npm version $npm_package_version && git add -A
